articles.title: Kate Hudson addresses criticism from real family behind her new movie 'Song Sung Blue'

neutral.headline: Family Members Express Concerns Over Portrayal of Neil Diamond Cover Band in "Song Sung Blue
neutral.body:

Hudson acknowledged the feedback from the family members and emphasized the creative liberties that are often taken in the film industry to tell a compelling story. She stated that the movie aimed to capture the essence of the band's journey and the impact of Neil Diamond's music on their lives.
However, some family members have disputed certain aspects of the film, claiming that it does not accurately represent their father's experience as a musician. They have requested a meeting with the filmmakers to address their concerns and ensure that the story is presented in a respectful and authentic manner.
As discussions continue between the filmmakers and the family members, it remains to be seen how their feedback will be incorporated into the final portrayal of the Neil Diamond cover band in "Song Sung Blue.
